creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: portrait of a child with curly hair and very large eyes, in black chalk; labeled in black ink on the image: #87; mounted on sheet with 2 other small drawings--further drawings have been removed; other drawings present are labeled: #85, #86; see L2009.52.66a and L2009.52.66b
provenance: Sale, Christie's, London, April 15, 1980, as "Property of a Gentleman," lot 53, as workshop of Cavaliere d'Arpino, with 2009.53.65a-d to McCrindle; Joseph F. McCrindle, New York (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Portrait of a Child
